title: Inter-TiKV idle network traffic increases about 100% since v6.5.0
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

v6.5.0

The issue is caused by:
  - https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/12839
  - https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/13657

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Create a cluster that has many regions (>20K).

### What did you expect?

The idle network traffic keeps the same as v6.1.0.
 
### What did happened?

The traffic increases about 100%.
